body_html: This gives large errors when computing gradient of gradient. I looked into the file containing _SeluGradGrad (tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py) and it looks alright. Does the failing test function use this to compute the gradient of gradient?

body: This gives large errors when computing gradient of gradient. I looked into the file containing `_SeluGradGrad` (tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py) and it looks alright. Does the failing test function use this to compute the gradient of gradient?
